description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The ' 98 Campaign of the 6th Massachusetts, U.S.V. ... With 79 illustrations, etc. [With an introduction by Curtis Guild.]" Author: EDWARDS, Frank E. Contributor: GUILD, Curtis. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9770.aa.19." Page: 371 Place of Publishing: Boston [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: Little, Brown & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001041189 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
